name: Antarctichill
description:
Made By: Team 3Squared

Info:
A singleplayer pong-like game, where the player bounces a puck inside a ice rink, avoiding snow piles and penguins. Try and get the highest score!

Controls:
A/< = Counter Clockwise Rotation
D/> = Clockwise Rotation
L-Shift/Space = Dash
P = Pause

Created by:
Anna Ross / Artist
Cody Smith / Artist
Benjamin Scott / Programmer
Dan Sohler / Designer
Josh Spence / Designer
